ROM.Changelog:
##### Android 8.0.1 - Miix4 Build 18.4.14 **Full changelogs are available at the official Hybrid Team Blog.**
* The April 5 Security Patch * Kernel updates and optimizations * Peformance fixes and improvements * Changes to the lock screen user interface
**If you download updates over a data connection or while roaming, additional charges may apply. It is advised to keep your device fully charged during the update.**
